name: Alf River
description: One of two rivers for which Alfadir is named, the Alf is the more northern of the two. It is a well developed river that provides irrigation to large swathes of countryside. The rights to the water of the Alf are tightly controlled by the Alfadiran government, or more accurately, by the large farmer barons who use the government to provide themselves large water subsidies and charge everyone else for access.
